column4: ok so im trying to install "DVD Encoder OGMRip" fro add/remove. when i try to install it it says it cant be installed, and to open Synaptic package maneger. what do i do there??
ok, well im REALLY new to ubuntu, and i have NO clue of what to do in there

There should be a search button at the top, click it, search the name of the program in the box, when it returns the results, look for that program, right click on it, select 'install' and click the green tick at the top
